Package in.co.rays.proj4.util

Class ServletUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.proj4.util.ServletUtility
  • public class ServletUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    ServletUtility is a helper class that provides common utility methods for forwarding, redirecting, setting messages, and storing data in the request scope while working with Servlets and JSPs.

    • Constructor Summary

      ServletUtility()
